rules_text:
[i](As a Conquest enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. When it’s defeated, put it onto the battlefield transformed.)[/i]
When Battle for Fort Alderosa enters the battlefield, distribute four +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures and/or Vehicles you control, then permanents you control with +1/+1 counters on them gain vigilance until end of turn.
rules_text2:
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
{G}{W}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature or Vehicle you control. All creatures able to block it this turn do so. Activate only as a sorcery.
